meanings.sent1: She was overgenerous with her compliments, always making others feel special.
meanings.sent2: He is known for being overgenerous with his time, always willing to help anyone in need.
meanings.sent3: The overgenerous fairy granted the entire village three wishes each, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her overgenerous heart overflowed with kindness, touching everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The overgenerous act of donating all her savings to charity left her feeling fulfilled.

meanings.definition: Excessively generous in giving or spending.
meanings.sent1: The overgenerous millionaire donated huge sums of money to various causes.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her overgenerous spending spree when she saw her empty bank account.
meanings.sent3: The overgenerous shopper bought so many gifts that she needed extra bags to carry them all.
meanings.sent4: His overgenerous nature led him to give away more than he could afford, causing financial troubles.
meanings.sent5: The overgenerous tip he left for the waiter made the server's day brighter.
